valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 17 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low 350 miles west of Shannon 982, expected Bailey 978 by 1800 Wednesday. High France 1025 expected alps with little change by same time
